title: Internship opportunities
content:
"The Gifts Network" invites enthusiastic Electronics and Communication students (Bachelors or 
Masters), who are currently in their 2nd or 3rd year, to apply for an exciting internship opportunity. 
This position is ideal for individuals with a preliminary knowledge of basic hardware interfacing, such 
as Arduino, ESP32, and Raspberry Pi, and a keen interest in Embedded device prototyping and 
interfacing for Smart Garden and Internet of Things (IoT) applications. A previous end-to-end project 
experience is an added advantage but not mandatory.

comments.body: Sounds good if you're into hardware. If you prefer software, look for MERN stack internships. I used job hunting for that once.
